course_title: Introduction to Resilience Theory in Community

610.comments: There are no co-requisites for this course. Should you have any questions and/or inquiries about this course please contatc Carrie Anne Vanderhoop at carrieanne.vanderhoop@ubc.ca

description: Theory of social-ecological resilience as  applied to cross-cultural community settings, using case studies from communities on Haida Gwaii and other exceptional cases of community resilience.
